alert.note: Alert for Cassia (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 7:31PM MDT until June 13 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pocatello has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cassia County in southeastern Idaho... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 730 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Declo, or near Burley, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Declo and Albion. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
